Description: BROWN LEATHER STRAP WATCH Brand New ~ By Strada ~ Japanese MovementThere is a Plastic Tab Around the Crown and is there to Save the Battery - PLEASE DO NOT REMOVE UNLESS KEEPING (If You Do Not Intend to Keep the Watch, then PLEASE DO NOT REMOVE THIS TAB - As per Ebay, It Needs to be Returned in the Same Condition as you Receive It, Thank You.2Gold Tone Studs on the Strap, Gold Tone Buckle, Gold Tone Numbers (3, 6, 9, 12), Gold Tone Hands and Gold Tone Around the Face**************POSTAGE & PACKING: IF, ON THE VERY RARE OCCASION, ROYAL MAIL/COURIER FAIL TO DELIVER AN ITEM, PLEASE CONTACT ME VIA EBAY MESSAGES FIRST (BEFORE OPENING A CASE), AS I HAVE NO OTHER WAY OF KNOWING ABOUT A LOST ITEM, TO LET ME KNOW AND I WILL TAKE CARE OF THE SITUATION. YOU ARE THE CUSTOMER AND I WANT YOU TO BE HAPPY. THANK YOU :) P&P is not just the price of the stamp, but also all of the packaging materials, packing time and fuel to the post office.Items are packaged with great care and packaging is recycled where possible to keep costs to a minimum.If an item is lost or damaged, which is out of my control, I will provide you with proof of posting receipt and assist you in any way I can in the rare/unfortunate event that this happens and you need to make a Postal Claim with Royal Mail/Other Courier.PLEASE SELECT YOUR CHOICE OF POSTAGE OPTION AT CHECKOUTFREE P&P 2nd CLASS STANDARD ~ 2nd CLASS RECORDED WHICH IS INSURED FOR YOUR OWN SECURITYItems Mailed DAILY Monday to Friday (excluding Bank Holidays and Weekends)FEEDBACK:When leaving feedback, please remember the STAR RATING IS FOR HOW QUICKLY THE ITEM IS DISPATCHED and not the amount of time it takes to arrive. Once dispatched we are in the hands of the Royal Mail.When you have received your item and left feedback, I will know the whole transaction is successfully completed and I will leave you positive feedback too, thanks :)If you have any queries regarding your purchase once received, please message me so that I can make things right, prior to leaving neutral / negative feedback or less than 5* rating, thanks :)COMBINED P&P:Please Have A Look At My Other Items That I Am Selling and Ask About Combined Postage for Multiple ItemsMaximum UK P&P £50.00
Title: STRADA WATCH with Brown Leather Strap BNNT FREE P&P

ReturnPolicy.Description:
PRIOR TO ANY RETURN:

1. Please contact me if the item is not as advertised (written details and photo) then on safe return of the goods I will give a refund, valid for fourteen days from date of purchase. 
2. Any questions/queries please ask BEFORE bidding. 
3. All returns must be sent back to me in the same condition as they were received.
4. Customer pays all return post charges.

NO RETURNS ON ANY LINGERIE OR MAKEUP DUE TO HYGIENE AND THE PERSONAL NATURE OF THE ITEM.

RETURNS ARE NOT ACCEPTED IF YOU CHANGE YOUR MIND OR AN ITEM DOES NOT FIT OR YOU DO NOT LIKE AN ITEM ONCE RECEIVED.
